text: Eversince (3V3R51NC3) is the first studio album by Swedish rapper and Drain Gang member Bladee. It was released on May 25, 2016 by YEAR0001. The album contains elements of cloud rap, "sadboy" rap and R&B.; == Track listing == == References == Category:2016 debut albums Category:Bladee albums Category:YEAR0001 albums
title: Eversince
